column4: General Role     Hermès is looking for a candidate for an internship in the Rome Boutique. He/she will closely work with the Store Team to promote a stimulating and modern visual identity, enhancing the novelty and craftsmanship of the products, in order to give the customer an engaging and complete shopping experience. The Intern will rapidly gain an understanding of the visual activities in a luxury fashion retail industry and their day-to-day organisation.       Context      Support the Visual Team in implementing the visual guidelines issued by Hermès International in line with the Maison's image standards;   Working closely with the Visual Team to manage the display, setting and graphics of the products inside the boutique and outside with the shop windows;   Supporting in the creation of the planning of the product assortment interventions, taking care of the layout of the goods on display;   Collaborate with the Visual Team on stock rotation, increasing sell-through, animating slow movers and prioritizing the Métier;   Product preparation from stock to exposure and from exposure reorganization to stock;   Manage and share visual photo reports. Additional Information:    Fitting CVs will be invited to a pre-recorded video interview to show us their personality and motivation for the position. This is a first step of the recruitment process and suitable video interviews will be contacted for a face to face interview. The recording can be submitted anytime of the day and we strongly suggest candidates to choose a quiet and natural light room. We are looking forward to seeing your video interview!      About the Hermès Group     Hermès Italie Spa Hermès was born in Paris in 1837 as a laboratory of harnesses and saddles for horses: since then, six generations of artisans have explored new crafts, animated by a creative impulse, combined with beautiful and processed with care material. Today Hermès is an international group committed to innovation in a subtle harmony between past, present and future. It is a company founded on high standard values of dedication to excellence and authenticity of its objects. An independent family house that pursues its French artisan tradition: Hermès creates, sells and manufactures beautiful, useful and durable objects. The company brings together more than 20.000 employees in 50 countries; the Italian branch is located in Milan and provides the local support and management to the 10 Stores present in the country. Hermes Italie was born in 1987 with the first store in Milan, 21 via Sant'Andrea. Since then the branch was opened and the continuous growth lead to the current retail presence in the country: 10 stores, including 2 seasonal openings and 2 flagship stores, located in Milan and Rome.
